html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

The holiday shopping season is in full swing, and Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals are finally here. Whether you're looking for the perfect Christmas gifts, some top-rated tech or something for your kitchen to make holiday cooking less stressful, the online shopping giant has some of the best Black Friday 2021 deals you can find online. Whatever you need this holiday season, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals on a variety of kitchen appliances, some super popular headphones and one of our favorite robot vacuums, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Meanwhile, you can check off even more things on your holiday shopping list and save big with markdowns on must-have products during Best Buy and Walmart's early Black Friday sales.

►Veterans Day: 40 retailers giving online discounts to veterans and active military for Veterans Day

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free to gain early access to plenty of Amazon Black Friday deals. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping, plus tons of other benefits, for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 5 best Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals you can get today

1. Up to 46% off: These cult-favorite Instant appliances

Amazon has several products from Instant (makers of the cult-favorite Instant Pot) on sale today, from the beloved pressure cooker to an air purifier. The 8-quart Duo Crisp 11-in-1 pressure cooker is on sale for $118.95, a 41% discount from the $199.99 list price. We named the 6-quart Duo Crisp ($119 at Walmart) with its smaller basket as one of our favorite pressure cookers for doing a reliable job preparing everything from ribs to soup, not to mention being easy to clean. If you prefer slow cooking to pressure cooking, there's the 6-quart Aura 10-in-1 slow cooker on sale for $69.95—that's a 46% discount from its list price of $129.95. Along with its slow cooking capabilities, Instant Pot says the Aura can bake, steam, ferment, sear and sauté. Instant has even branched out from cookers, and right now you can get the Instant Air Purifier for $139.99 (a 42% discount) that promises its 3-in-1 filtration captures 99.97% of smoke, dust, pollen, pet dander and odors.

Save up to 36% on Instant Pot Air Fryer and Ovens

Save up to 41% on Instant Pot Pressure Cookers

Save up to 43% on Instant Appliances  

Get the Instant Pot 6-Quart Aura 10-in-1 Slow Cooker for $69.95 (Save $60)

Get the Instant Pot Instant Air Air Purifier for Large Rooms for $139.99 (Save $100)

2. Save $59: One of our favorite headphones

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for the lowest price we've ever seen. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancellation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $189.99—a $59.01 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $189.99 (Save $59.01)

3. 31% off: This high-resolution TV

Give your home media room a major visual upgrade with this 65-inch Toshiba 4K UHD Smart Fire TV, on sale for $499.99. This 4K LED panel is usually priced at $719.99, but right now Amazon is offering it at a 31% discount. As a Fire TV, the Toshiba can bring your favorite streaming services and over-the-air channels together on one screen. Toshiba says the TV comes packed with a "high-performance 4K engine" to offer crisp and clear imagery.

Get the Toshiba 65-Inch LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV for $499.99 (Save $220)

4. Save $70: Our favorite affordable robot vacuum

We named the Eufy BoostIQ RoboVac 11S our favorite affordable robot vacuum and right now, it's selling for the super-low price of $129.99—one of the lowest prices it's ever been. Normally listed for $229.99, you can get this smart appliance for 43% off if you use the $60 coupon on the product page and the promo code EUFY11SLIM at checkout. We love the 11S for its ability to pick up more dirt per run (11.6 grams, specifically) than more expensive models from other developers. Its slim design makes it capable of moving under furniture and it runs quiet, letting you be able to run it while watching TV or getting other work done.

Get the Eufy by Anker BoostIQ RoboVac 11S for $129.99 with promo code EUFY11SLIM (Save $100)

5. Less than $35: This durable toolbox

Keep your workshop essentials organized and secure with this DeWalt large toolbox on sale for $34.97. Normally priced at $47.50, Amazon is selling the hardware carrier at a 26% discount. DeWalt says the box is made with a 4-millimeter thick structural foam box wall and an integrated water seal to protect your tools from any drop or water damage. 

Get the DeWalt Large Toolbox for $34.97 (Save $12.53)

Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals you may have missed

1. iRobot Roomba i6+

Roomba is synonymous with robot vacuums and the brand has earned high praise from shoppers and reviewers (us included!) for consistent performance and user-friendly interfaces. A great example is the iRobot Roomba i6+, on sale now for $549.99—that's a 31% discount from its regular price of $799.99. The i6+ is one of our favorite Roombas for having similar dirt pickup and self-emptying mechanisms as our all-time favorite, the Roomba i7+ ($599.99), while currently being more affordable (note, however that the i6+ doesn't come with the spare filter and extra bags that the i7+ does). 

Get the iRobot Roomba i6+ for $549.99 (Save $250)

2. NordicTrack Exercise Machines 

Bring your exercise indoors with savings on two different fitness machines from NordicTrack. The NordicTrack 1750 commercial treadmill is on sale for $1,599, a $400 savings from its normal $1,999 list price. The 1750 is the best treadmill we've ever tried, wowing us with its incredible range of speed (between 0.5 miles per hour to 12 mph) and incline (-3% to 15%, which even lets it simulate going downhill). Our tester said it was a "joy" to run on the 1750, with an "ideal springiness-to-firmness ratio" that she felt protected her joints without making her feel like she would run off the machine itself. The 22-inch NordicTrack S22i commercial studio cycle is also on sale for $1,499, a $700 drop from its regular $2,199 price. The S22i is one of our favorite exercise bikes, having impressed our tester with its ability to automatically adjust both its electromagnetic resistance and incline. 

Save as much as 32% on NordicTrack exercise machines

3. Wahl Color Pro Hair Clipper and Trimmer

Keep your hair in line without visiting the barber's chair with the Wahl Color pro clipper and trimmer, on sale for $18.37. Normally listed for $31.99, this cordless rechargeable beauty tool is now 43% off. The clipper comes with eight guiding combs color-coordinated to specific hair length measurements written on the trimmer for foolproof trims. Wahl says each charge of the trimmer's battery lasts 60 minutes.

Get the Wahl Color Pro Hair Clipper and Trimmer for $18.37 (Save $13.62)

4. Samsung 2 TB T7 Portable SSD

Keep your essential digital files backed up on the Samsung T7 portable SSD for less than $250. Normally listed for $329.99, the 2-terabyte drive is on sale for an $80 price cut. The T7 is one of our favorite portable SSDs for its super sleek design and rugged aluminum case. The 2.7-gigabyte test file took just under six seconds to copy to the T7, making it better for transferring smaller files every now and then rather than moving the entire capacity of a PC hard drive.

Get the Samsung 2 TB T7 Portable SSD for $249.99 (Save $80)

5. Philips One Toothbrush

If you want to give your teeth a better daily cleaning, the Philips One is ready to meet your dental needs for a super-affordable price. Typically listed for as low as $24.95, you can get the portable battery-powered toothbrush in four different colors today for $14.95. Philips says the One can run for three months on just one AAA battery and offers micro-vibrations in addition to manual brush motions to give your teeth a better polish. It also features a two-minute timer to make sure you get the right amount of cleaning and comes with a sleek travel case so you can take your clean routine on the road.

Get the Philips One Battery Toothbrush for $14.95 (Save $10 to $10.04)

Other noteworthy Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals we found

  • Get up to 25% back on select Amazon purchases with an Amazon Prime Card and eligible Prime membership 
  • Get three books or movies for the price of two 
  • Save up to 48% on select spices
  • Three Months of Amazon Music Unlimited and Showtime for $2.97 (Save $53.97)
  • 20-Piece Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bars for $12.51 with coupon (Save $6.73)
  • TP-Link Kasa Smart Plug Power Strip for $22.79 (Save $7.20)
  • LEGO City Advent Calendar for $23.99 (Save $6)
  • Hamilton Beach Electric Tea Kettle for $24.88 (Save $10.11)
  • TP-Link Kasa 6.6-Foot Smart LED Light Strip for $39.99 (Save $30)
  • Roku Ultra for $69 (Save $30.99)
  • Ninja Foodi Smart XL 6-in-1 Indoor Grill with 4-Quart Air Fryer for $249.99 (Save $50)
  • Lenovo 13-Inch Chromebook Flex 5 for $299.99 (Save $130)

When is Amazon Black Friday 2021? 

Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals are in full swing. This year, Amazon kicked off its holiday shopping season earlier than ever. The popular online retailer announced its first wave of Black Friday sales on October 4 , with markdowns across all categories. We expect to see even deeper discounts on everything from kitchen essentials and electronics to toys and fashion pieces in the coming weeks. 

What are the best deals from the Amazon Black Friday 2021 sale? 

To date, we've seen massive Amazon Black Friday deals on air fryers, headphones, home goods and more—including tons of products from some of our favorite brands, like Apple, KitchenAid, Instant Pot, Sony, Bose, iRobot and Shark.

Every day Amazon adds even more sales to their lineup of Black Friday 2021 deals. Be sure to bookmark this page and check back frequently to scoop the hottest Amazon discounts on must-have items this holiday season. 

Are Amazon Black Friday sales available online? 

Yes. Amazon Black Friday sales are exclusively available online. 

What's the difference between Amazon Black Friday deals and Amazon Cyber Monday deals? 

With Amazon Black Friday deals already here, the early holiday sales double as both Black Friday discounts and pre-Cyber Monday deals. While, technically, Amazon Cyber Monday deals roll out as soon as Black Friday ends on November 26 , we expect to see significant overlap in Amazon's roundup of Black Friday and Cyber Monday markdowns. Both waves of holiday deals will be exclusively available online, so be sure to secure your Amazon Prime membership ahead of time to enjoy fast and free shipping. 

Does Amazon have special Black Friday deals for Amazon Prime members? 

Yes. During the holiday shopping season, Amazon Prime members have early access to select holiday deals and can even earn up to 25% back on select Amazon purchases with an Amazon Prime Card and an eligible Prime membership. Meanwhile, Prime members can get their holiday gifts quicker with access to free and fast shipping, with millions of must-have items available for same-day delivery. If you aren't already an Amazon Prime member, don't worry—there's still plenty of time to sign up.    

When does the Amazon Black Friday sale end? 

The Amazon Black Friday sale ends on November 26 , with Amazon Cyber Monday deals rolling out the following day, on November 27 . Keep in mind, however, that many of the markdowns included in the Amazon Black Friday sale are one-day deals. 

Following the Black Friday and Cyber Monday weekend of sales, we expect to see discounts on select items throughout the holiday season—however, with shipping delays and stock shortages expected, we recommend shopping early to ensure you get all the holiday gifts on your list this year. 

Shop Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals right now. 

Don't get thwarted by shipping delays or sold-out favorites this holiday season. Sign up for our free weekly newsletter to get shopping tips, deals, product reviews, gift guides and more.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.

This article originally appeared on Reviewed: Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals are live: Save on Apple, Instant Pot and more
